name: cgc
description: CGC-DataVizTool is a web-based program that simplifies and improves the display of agricultural data for the **Canadian Grain Commission**.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.init: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm run build && npm prune --omit=dev" "cd client && npm run build && npm prune --omit=dev" && npm run copy-static
